com.gemalto.idp.mobile.authentication

Class IdpAuthException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.gemalto.idp.mobile.core.IdpException
          • com.gemalto.idp.mobile.authentication.IdpAuthException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BioFingerprintException, BiometricException, FaceAuthException

    public class IdpAuthException
extends IdpException
    The base exception for all system/checked exception raised by Mobile Protector SDK.

    It is used to either wrap an underlying exception or extended for specific errors.

    It also implements the IdpResult interface to unify the error handling.

    Since:
    4.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
